subject: New review (4★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from Nigel S.)
description_text:
Rating: 4 | Review Text: The box is well made and works very well. 
I had no problems at all setting things up apart from no usb cable which I believe they should supply.
